name: Flip To Unite
description:
Flip the room to solve simple puzzle to reunite our little friends!

Use your characters and objects to activate switches and solve puzzles

Controls

Use "A" and "D" to move left and right.

"W" to jump.

"Q" and "E" to rotate room.

Game made in GameMaker Studio 1.4

Not gonna lie rushed like crazy to finish pretty sure end is buggy :D also no music :(

Known Bugs:

Game freezes when moving the box sometimes.

End switch doesn't work, when both characters are together in the center you win.

Slick/conveyor blocks well get you stuck sometimes.

V02

Added new version, fixes some super small sprite issues.

Fix last trigger, you can now beat the game!
